actions.text: On agreeing to the Cao amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment includes information about credit risk and financial counseling services to mortgagors in addition to the housing and loan modification information currently provided for in the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-503 to include information about credit risk and financial counseling services to mortgagors in addition to the housing and loan modification information currently included in the bill.
